## Load libraries and data
```{r, message=FALSE} 

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
refine_original_2 <- read.csv("refine_original.csv")
refine_original_2 <- tbl_df(refine_original_2)

```

## 1: Clean up brand names

```{r}

refine_original_2$company[1:6] = "philips"
refine_original_2$company[7:13] = "akzo"
refine_original_2$company[14:16] = "philips"
refine_original_2$company[17:21] = "van houten"
refine_original_2$company[22:25] = "unilever"

```

## 2: Separate produce code and number

```{r}

refine_original_2 <- separate(refine_original_2, "Product.code...number", c("product_code", "product_number"), sep = "-")

```

## 3: Add product categories

```{r}

products <- c("Smartphone", "TV", "Laptop", "Tablet")
product_code <- c("p","v","x","q")
product_df <- data_frame(products, product_code)
refine_originial_2 <- left_join(refine_original_2, product_df, by="product_code")

```

## 4: Add full address for geocoding

```{r}

refine_original_2 <- unite(refine_original_2, full_address, address, city, country, sep = ", ", remove = FALSE)

```
